mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTY (PARTY_ID, PARTY_UUID, PARTY_TYPE_ID, PARTY_NAME, DESCRIPTION, STATUS_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY_USER_LOGIN, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_USER_LOGIN) VALUES (#{partyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partyUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createByUserLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedByUserLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO USER_LOGIN (USER_LOGIN_ID, ENABLED, CURRENT_PASSWORD, PARTY_ID) VALUES (#{userLoginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'T', #{currentPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
INSERT INTO PARTY_ROLE (PARTY_ID, ROLE_TYPE_ID, DESCRIPTION) VALUES (#{partyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO CONTACT_MECH (CONTACT_MECH_ID, CONTACT_MECH_TYPE_ID, TELECOM_NUMBER_ID, PARTY_ID) VALUES (#{contactMechId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contactMechTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telecomNumberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

INSERT INTO TELECOM_NUMBER (TELECOM_NUMBER_ID, COUNTRY_CODE, CITY_CODE, CONTACT_NUMBER) VALUES (#{telecomNumberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contactNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PARTY_ID AS PARTY_ID, PT.PARTY_TYPE_ID AS PARTY_TYPE_ID, P.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, P.STATUS_ID AS STATUS_ID, P.CREATED_DATE AS CREATED_DATE, P.CREATED_BY_USER_LOGIN AS CREATED_BY_USER_LOGIN, P.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE AS LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, P.LAST_MODIFIED_BY_USER_LOGIN AS LAST_MODIFIED_BY_USER_LOGIN, UL.USER_LOGIN_ID AS USER_LOGIN_ID, UL.CURRENT_PASSWORD AS CURRENT_PASSWORD FROM PARTY P INNER JOIN PARTY_TYPE PT ON PT.PARTY_TYPE_ID = P.PARTY_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN USER_LOGIN UL ON UL.PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID WHERE UL.USER_LOGIN_ID = #{userLoginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P.STATUS_ID = 'ENABLED'

SELECT P.PARTY_ID AS PARTY_ID, PR.ROLE_TYPE_ID AS ROLE_TYPE_ID, PR.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM PARTY P INNER JOIN USER_LOGIN UL ON UL.PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID INNER JOIN PARTY_ROLE PR ON PR.PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID WHERE UL.USER_LOGIN_ID = #{userLoginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P.STATUS_ID = 'ENABLED'

SELECT P.PARTY_ID AS PARTY_ID, CM.CONTACT_MECH_ID AS CONTACT_MECH_ID, CM.CONTACT_MECH_TYPE_ID AS CONTACT_MECH_TYPE_ID, TN.TELECOM_NUMBER_ID AS TELECOM_NUMBER_ID, TN.COUNTRY_CODE AS COUNTRY_CODE, TN.CITY_CODE AS CITY_CODE, TN.CONTACT_NUMBER AS CONTACT_NUMBER FROM PARTY P INNER JOIN USER_LOGIN UL ON UL.PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID INNER JOIN CONTACT_MECH CM ON CM.PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID INNER JOIN TELECOM_NUMBER TN ON TN.TELECOM_NUMBER_ID = CM.TELECOM_NUMBER_ID WHERE UL.USER_LOGIN_ID = #{userLoginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P.STATUS_ID = 'ENABLED'
